description: Variation of Condition 12 of planning permission dated 23 June 2021 (RN: 21/02164/FULL) for: Erection of a pavilion structure within the Quadrangle for use as additional restaurant seating and bar space in association with the restaurant on the ground floor of the building (north side of the Quadrangle); installation of a water feature; retention and relaying of Quadrangle courtyard cobbles within a revised design layout; installation of a sesame lift to the steps on the north side of the Quadrangle and associated works namely, to vary the wording of Condition 12 to change the opening hours of the Quadrangle pavilion from 08.00 until 22.00 hours daily to 07.00 until 01.00 hours daily.
